title: Win It Weekly: Velocio Apparel Gift Certificate
content:
How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a $500 gift card from Velocio Apparel.

Prize:

  • A gift card to Velocio Apparel available for any product.
  • MSRP $500

Prize Details:

In time for the drop of the Spring / Summer Collection, Velocio Apparel is offering up a $500 gift certificate to improve every ride.
author: CyclingTips
